meanings.definition: Clothing or accessories that can be worn on the body.
meanings.sent1: I love shopping for new wearables to add to my wardrobe.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy wearing stylish wearables to express their personality.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show featured futuristic wearables that lit up the runway.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of vintage wearables told a story of past trends.
meanings.sent5: The store displayed a variety of colorful wearables for sale.

meanings.definition: Electronic devices that can be worn on the body, such as smartwatches or fitness trackers.
meanings.sent1: My smartwatch is a useful wearable that helps me track my daily steps.
meanings.sent2: Tech enthusiasts are always eager to try the latest wearables on the market.
meanings.sent3: The wearable fitness tracker reminded him to stand up and move every hour.
meanings.sent4: She relied on her wearable device to receive notifications throughout the day.
meanings.sent5: The new wearable gadget was designed to enhance the user's daily activities.
